post:
Matt has arranged the last of these servers that we had in our racks:

- 2 x L5420 CPU's with heatsinks
- 4 x 500GB Samsung SATA2 drives
- X7DBR-3 Supermicro Motherboard
- 8 x 2GB FBDDR RAM
- Supermicro chassis - C815TQ-560 - In black.

Riser card included

Rails included

$400 + shipping.

Shipping is around $50 anywhere in the US. Local pick up is also available.

Francisco
